title: Pet-friendly 2 bed / 2 bath! Your dogs and cats are welcome!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Spring Lake Apartments!', 'Located at:', '7000 Southlake Pkwy', 'Morrow, GA 30260', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  2', 'Square Footage: 1158 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1763/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Spring Lake Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within minutes from Clayton State University, but we are also minutes from Southlake Mall, Piedmont Henry Hospital, Gillem Logistics Center, and numerous shops and restaurants.', 'We are only a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'Community Features:', '− Clothes Care Center', '− Clubhouse w/WIFI', '− Clubroom', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Package Receiving', '− Pet Care', '− Waterfront', '− Community Playground', '− Flexible Lease Terms', '− Maintenance on site', '− Picnic Areas & Gazebos', '− Picnic Pavilion with Grills', '− Relaxing Community Lake', '− Relaxing Community Lake & Pavilion', '− Resort Inspired Pool', 'Unit Features:', '− Balcony/Patio', '− Custom Paint Tone', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Fireplace', '− Lake views', '− Linen Closets', '− Oven/Range', '− Spacious Sunrooms', '− Storage Units', '− Air Conditioning and Heating', '− Brushed Nickel Hardware', '− Brushed Nickel Lighting', '− Ceiling Fans with Lighting', '− Classic Two-Tone Paint', '− Fully Equipped Kitchens', '− Granite Inspired Countertops', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Roommate Style Floor Plans Available', '− Separate Dining Areas', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Spring Lake Apartments is a pet-friendly community that welcomes two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please call our community for complete pet', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8367192B970C4C4']
